Fred Nyamitago Monari is a statistician and lecturer at Kisii University with extensive expertise in applied statistics, epidemiological modeling, and public health data analysis. His work focuses on leveraging advanced statistical methods and interdisciplinary collaboration to address pressing challenges in health, climate, and environmental research.
